heading: This site!
description: A fun little PWA built with Angular. Take a look at the code over on my github!

heading: Paws Careers
description: This was a really fun little site to work on! It had a really nice and easy ATS integration with Lever, I wish more clients used Lever!

heading: Travelex Engineering Careers
description: The Travelex site is quite a busy, fun design that makes good use of some subtle animations. It also used to contain an interactive 'Hello, World!' themed landing page but this was scrapped before release.

heading: Worldpay Graduates
description: The Worldpay graduates site is a really clean design that was nice to work on and also included some fun features such as the card reader on the landing page.

heading: Linklaters 25
description: The linklaters 25 was a competition site I worked on as one of my first projects at Wiser. It consisted of a landing page and an apply form. The competition is now closed so the site has changed a little since it went live.

heading: Colt Careers
description: This site involved an integration with SAP Success Factors to pull the vacancies data for the apply page. The apply page also implements searching vacancies, and query parameters.

heading: Wiser | Main Site
description: A redesigned website for Wiser. We are a creative agency and a recruitment company combined. I'm mainly working on our client facing projects that focus on employer brand.

heading: Wiser | Creative genius
description: The creative genius competition was a design competition run by Wiser. It consisted of a landing page and an apply form customized for each of the 9 questions. I also worked how the application data was collected and stored.
